name: Supplier filtered records
script:
def rfq_suppliers_api(supplier_group):
    suppliers = frappe.get_all(
        "Supplier",
        filters={"supplier_group": supplier_group},
        fields=["name", "supplier_name"]
    )
    frappe.response['message'] = suppliers
    

supplier_group = frappe.request.form.get("supplier_group")
rfq_suppliers_api(supplier_group)

name: Get Supplier list as per item filter
script:
def get_suppliers_by_item(item):
    """
    Get all suppliers linked to a given Item.
    """
    suppliers = frappe.db.sql("""
        SELECT name, supplier 
        FROM `tabItem Supplier`
        WHERE parent = %s
    """, item, as_dict=True)

    frappe.response['message'] = suppliers

    
items = frappe.form_dict.get("item","")

get_suppliers_by_item(items)

name: Unlock RFQ after record submitted
script:
def unlock_rfq_after_submit(rfq_name):
    rfq = frappe.get_doc("Request for Quotation", rfq_name)
    if rfq.docstatus != 1:
        frappe.throw("Only submitted RFQs can be unlocked.")

    # Instead of a new field → downgrade docstatus temporarily
    rfq.db_set("docstatus", 0)
    
    
    # Downgrade all child table rows (if needed)
    # Child table doctype: "Request for Quotation Item"
    for item in rfq.items:  # "items" is default fieldname for child table
        item.db_set("docstatus", 0)  # ensures db reflects draft
        
    frappe.response['message'] = True

    
rfq_name = frappe.form_dict.get("rfq_name","")

unlock_rfq_after_submit(rfq_name)
